name: blobfish
dialogue: Sorry, buddy, place has been picked clean. And I have dibs on whats left.
What are you still hangin' around for? Go find some other carcas to munch on.
No, I ain't sharing. These things don't happen often and I'm already late as it is. At beast I've got maybe some cartilage left and if I'm lucky I can take a bit of bone as a souvinir.
And I had to fight off an octopus just to get this!
So up yours, go out and find your own scraps, you bum!
